name: Cool Headed (itch)
description:
Cool Headed

Cool Headed is a puzzle programming game inspired by lemmings:

  • go to the overworld and choose your destination
  • choose the team that will face the challenge
  • click on the orders you want to give, set timers
  • watch your bots go
  • earn rewards

More than 100 levels of increasing difficulty and hours of reflexion and secrets await
